8344  return true;
8345 # else
8346  return false;
8347 # endif
8348 }
8349 
8350 
8351 /******************************************************************/
8352 /* */
8353 /* */
8354 /******************************************************************/
8355 
8356 enum
8357 {
8358  ACTION_SET_FLAG,
8359  ACTION_CLEAR_FLAG,
8360  ACTION_QUERY_FLAG,
8361  ACTION_SET_OBJECT_FLAG, // different than the script flags.
8362  ACTION_CLEAR_OBJECT_FLAG, // different than the script flags.
8363  ACTION_FLAG_EXCEPTION_BY_CHECKSUM,
8364  ACTION_SEE_IF_OBJECT_EXISTS,
8365 };
8366 
8367 struct SActionData
8368 {
8369  int Flag;
8370  int Action;
8371  bool ReturnValue;
8372  bool ObjectFound;
8373 };
8374 
8375 struct SActionData_NameChecksum
8376 {
8377  uint32 ObjectNameChecksum;
8378  SActionData actionData;
8379 };
8380 
8381 struct SActionData_NodeIndex
8382 {
8383  int NodeIndex;
8384  SActionData actionData;
8385 };
8386 
8387 /******************************************************************/
8388 /* */
8389 /* */
8390 /******************************************************************/
8391 
8392 static void DoAction( Obj::CCompositeObject* pOb, SActionData* pData )
8393 {
8394  pData->ObjectFound = true;
8395  switch ( pData->Action )
8396  {
8397  case ( ACTION_SET_FLAG ):
8398  pOb->mScriptFlags |= ( 1 << pData->Flag );
8399  pData->ReturnValue = true;
8400  break;
8401  case ( ACTION_CLEAR_FLAG ):
8402  pOb->mScriptFlags &= ~( 1 << pData->Flag );
8403  pData->ReturnValue = true;
8404  break;
8405  case ( ACTION_QUERY_FLAG ):
8406  if ( pOb->mScriptFlags & ( 1 << pData->Flag ) )
8407  {
8408  pData->ReturnValue = true;
8409  }
8410  break;
8411  case ( ACTION_SET_OBJECT_FLAG ):
8412  pOb->SetFlags(((Obj::CObject *) pOb)->GetFlags() | ( pData->Flag )); // Note: Flags are passed as a bitfield
8413  break;
8414  case ( ACTION_CLEAR_OBJECT_FLAG ):
8415  pOb->SetFlags(((Obj::CObject *) pOb)->GetFlags() & ~( pData->Flag ));
8416  break;
8417  case ( ACTION_FLAG_EXCEPTION_BY_CHECKSUM ):
8418  {
8419  pOb->SelfEvent((pData->Flag));
8420  pData->ReturnValue = true;
8421  }
8422  break;
8423  case ( ACTION_SEE_IF_OBJECT_EXISTS ):
8424  break;
8425  default:
8426  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0,( "Unknown action %d", pData->Action ));
8427  break;
8428  }
8429 }
8430 
8431 /******************************************************************/
8432 /* */
8433 /* */
8434 /******************************************************************/
8435 
8436 static void Action_ByNameChecksum( Obj::CObject* pOb, void* pVoidData )
8437 {
8438 
8439  Dbg_MsgAssert(pOb,("NULL pOb"));
8440  Dbg_MsgAssert(pVoidData,("NULL pVoidData"));
8441 
8442  SActionData_NameChecksum *pData=(SActionData_NameChecksum*)pVoidData;
8443 
8444  // Mick - find objects based either on their node name (soon to go away)
8445  // or by their ID (which is set to the node name for composite objects)
8446  if ( pOb->GetID() == pData->ObjectNameChecksum )
8447  {
8448  DoAction( (Obj::CCompositeObject*)pOb, &pData->actionData );
8449  }
8450 }
8451 
8452 /******************************************************************/
8453 /* */
8454 /* */
8455 /******************************************************************/
8456 
8457 static void Action_ByNodeIndex(Obj::CObject* pOb, void* pVoidData)
8458 {
8459 
8460  Dbg_MsgAssert(pOb,("NULL pOb"));
8461  Dbg_MsgAssert(pVoidData,("NULL pVoidData"));
8462 
8463  SActionData_NodeIndex *pData=(SActionData_NodeIndex*)pVoidData;
8464 
8465  uint32 nodeName = SkateScript::GetNodeNameChecksum(pData->NodeIndex);
8466 
8467  if (pOb->GetID() == nodeName )
8468  {
8469  DoAction( (Obj::CCompositeObject*)pOb, &pData->actionData );
8470  }
8471 }
8472 
8473 /******************************************************************/
8474 /* */
8475 /* */
8476 /******************************************************************/
8477 
8478 // @script | ClearFlag | clears a flag
8479 // @uparm 1 | the flag to clear
8480 // @parmopt name | name | | the name of the object
8481 // @parmopt string | prefix | | prefix value
8482 bool ScriptClearFlag(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
8483 {
8484 
8485  return ( ScriptDoAction( pParams, pScript, ACTION_CLEAR_FLAG ) );
8486 }
8487 
8488 /******************************************************************/
8489 /* */
8490 /* */
8491 /******************************************************************/
8492 
8493 // @script | SendFlag | Sets a specified flag in a named object. All
8494 // objects have a set of 32 flags. For example: <nl>
8495 // SendFlag 14 name =TRG_Car03 ; no quotes <nl>
8496 // This will search all the objects until it finds the one called
8497 // TRG_Car03, and will then set its flag 14. The flag value must
8498 // be between 0 and 31 inclusive. To aid readability, names should
8499 // be used for the flags, and there is a file flags.q where the
8500 // definitions should be put
8501 // @uparm 1 | the flag to set
8502 // @parmopt name | name | | the name of the object
8503 // @parmopt string | prefix | | prefix value
8504 bool ScriptSendFlag(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
8505 {
8506 
8507  return ( ScriptDoAction( pParams, pScript, ACTION_SET_FLAG ) );
8508 }
8509 
8510 /******************************************************************/
8511 /* */
8512 /* */
8513 /******************************************************************/
8514 
8515 // @script | QueryFlag | you can query a flag on an object (or several
8516 // objects if using links parameter or prefix = "Something_" parameter
8517 // instead of name = Something_Unique). In the case of one object,
8518 // QueryFlag will return true or false depending on if the flag is set
8519 // or not. In the case of several objects, the function will return true
8520 // if any of the objects specified have that flag set, false otherwise
8521 // @uparm 1 | the flag to query
8522 // @parmopt name | name | | the name of the object
8523 // @parmopt string | prefix | | prefix value
8524 bool ScriptQueryFlag(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
8525 {
8526 
8527  return ( ScriptDoAction( pParams, pScript, ACTION_QUERY_FLAG ) );
8528 }
8529 
8530 /******************************************************************/
8531 /* */
8532 /* */
8533 /******************************************************************/
8534 
8535 // @script | SendException | use the SendException command in the same
8536 // way you would use the SendFlag command: you can specify name=whatever_object
8537 // or links or prefix="whatever_" (just like with SendFlag).
8538 // @uparm Exception | the flag
8539 // @parmopt name | name | | object name
8540 // @parmopt string | prefix | | prefix value
8541 bool ScriptFlagException(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
8542 {
8543 
8544  return ( ScriptDoAction( pParams, pScript, ACTION_FLAG_EXCEPTION_BY_CHECKSUM ) );
8545 }
8546 
8547 /******************************************************************/
8548 /* */
8549 /* */
8550 /******************************************************************/
8551 
8552 // @script | IsAlive | Takes the same arguments as SendFlag etc... Returns
8553 // true if the object currently exists
8554 // @parm name | name | object name
8555 bool ScriptCheckIfAlive( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
8556 {
8557 
8558  return ( DoNodeAction( pParams, pScript, NODE_ACTION_CHECK_IF_ALIVE ) );
8559 
8560 }
8561 
8562 /******************************************************************/
8563 /* */
8564 /* */
8565 /******************************************************************/
8566 
8567 static void SetUpActionData( SActionData *pData, int flag, int action )
8568 {
8569 
8570  Dbg_MsgAssert( pData,( "Fire matt the idiot" ));
8571  pData->Flag = flag;
8572  pData->Action = action;
8573  pData->ObjectFound = false;
8574  pData->ReturnValue = false;
8575 }
8576 
8577 /******************************************************************/
8578 /* */
8579 /* */
8580 /******************************************************************/
8581 
8582 // Used to perform actions to nodes by prefix, name checksum, or links -- but this version
8583 // only operates on the nodes that create CMovingObjects... For the general version (applicable
8584 // to nodes that create Environmental Objects, Rails, etc... AS WELL as CMovingObjects, see
8585 // DoNodeAction( )
8586 bool ScriptDoAction(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript, int action )
8587 {
8588 
8589  int flag = 0;
8590  if (action == ACTION_FLAG_EXCEPTION_BY_CHECKSUM)
8591  {
8592  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
8593  bool GotFlag=
8594  #endif
8595  pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME,(uint32*)&flag);
8596  Dbg_MsgAssert(GotFlag,("\n%s\nSendException require a chechecksum name to be specified.\n(NOT AN INTEGER)",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
8597  }
8598  else
8599  {
8600  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
8601  bool GotFlag=
8602  #endif
8603  pParams->GetInteger(NONAME,&flag);
8604  Dbg_MsgAssert(GotFlag,("\n%s\nFlag commands require a flag to be specified.\n(Either an integer or a name defined to be an integer)",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
8605  Dbg_MsgAssert(flag>=0 && flag<32,("\n%s\nBad flag value of %d, value must be between 0 and 31",pScript->GetScriptInfo(),flag));
8606 
8607  }
8608  uint32 nameChecksum;
8609  const char *pPrefix;
8610  int i;
8611 
8612 
8613  bool useCurrentLinks = false;
8614  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( 0x2e7d5ee7 ) || // checksum 'links'
8615  ( useCurrentLinks = pParams->ContainsFlag( 0xbceb479a ) ) ) // checksum 'currentlinks'
8616  {
8617 
8618  Dbg_MsgAssert(0,("\n%s\n'links' and 'currentlinks' are deprecated\n",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
8619  }
8620 
8621  if ( pParams->GetChecksum( 0xa1dc81f9, &nameChecksum) ) // 'name'
8622  {
8623  SActionData_NameChecksum Data;
8624  Data.ObjectNameChecksum = nameChecksum;
8625  SetUpActionData( &Data.actionData, flag, action );
8626  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
8627  skate_mod->GetObjectManager()->ProcessAllObjects(Action_ByNameChecksum,&Data);
8628  Dbg_MsgAssert( Data.actionData.ObjectFound,( "\n%s\nDidn't find object specified '%s'.", pScript->GetScriptInfo( ), Script::FindChecksumName( nameChecksum ) ) );
8629  return ( Data.actionData.ReturnValue );
8630  }
8631  if ( pParams->GetText( 0x6c4e7971, &pPrefix ) ) // checksum 'prefix'
8632  {
8633  // Create with a prefix specified:
8634  uint16 numNodes = 0;
8635  const uint16 *pMatchingNodes = SkateScript::GetPrefixedNodes( pPrefix, &numNodes );
8636  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
8637  SActionData_NodeIndex Data;
8638  SetUpActionData( &Data.actionData, flag, action );
8639  for ( i = 0; i < numNodes; i++ )
8640  {
8641  Data.NodeIndex = pMatchingNodes[ i ];
8642  skate_mod->GetObjectManager()->ProcessAllObjects(Action_ByNodeIndex,&Data);
8643  }
8644  Dbg_MsgAssert( Data.actionData.ObjectFound,( "\n%s\nDidn't find any objects with prefix %s.", pScript->GetScriptInfo( ), pPrefix ));
8645  return ( Data.actionData.ReturnValue );
8646  }
8647 #if 0 // put in if ever necessary:
8648  // set the flag on ourself:
8649  if ( pScript->mpObject )
8650  {
8651  switch ( action )
8652  {
8653  case ( ACTION_SET_FLAG ):
8654  pScript->mpObject->mScriptFlags |= ( 1 << flag );
8655  return ( true );
8656  case ( ACTION_CLEAR_FLAG ):
8657  pScript->mpObject->mScriptFlags &= ~( 1 << flag );
8658  return ( true );
8659  case ( ACTION_QUERY_FLAG ):
8660  return ( pScript->mpObject->mScriptFlags & ( 1 << flag );
8661  default:
8662  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0,( "Unknown flag action %d", action ));
8663  break;
8664  }
8665  }
8666  else
8667  {
8668  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0,( "\n%s\nNeed to specify an object, or call this command on a script associated with an object.", pScript->GetScriptInfo( ) ));
8669  }
8670 #endif
8671  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0,( "\n%s\nMust specify a name, links, or prefix please.", pScript->GetScriptInfo( ) ));
8672  return ( false );
8673 }
8674 
8675 /******************************************************************/
8676 /* */
8677 /* */
8678 /******************************************************************/
8679 
8680 bool ScriptSetVisibilityFromNodeIndex( int nodeIndex, bool invisible, int viewport_number )
8681 {
8682  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
8683 
8684  Script::CArray *pNodeArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD(0xc472ecc5,"NodeArray") );
8685  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNodeArray,( "No NodeArray found" ));
8686 
8687  Script::CStruct *pNode=pNodeArray->GetStructure( nodeIndex );
8688  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNode,( "NULL pNode" ));
8689 
8690  // If this is a net game, don't show/hide objects that were meant to be left out for
8691  // performance/bandwidth/gameplay reasons
8692  if ( skate_mod->ShouldBeAbsentNode( pNode ) )
8693  {
8694  return true;
8695  }
8696 
8697  uint32 ClassChecksum = 0;
8698  pNode->GetChecksum( 0x12b4e660 /*"Class"*/, &ClassChecksum );
8699 
8700  switch (ClassChecksum)
8701  {
8702  case 0xe47f1b79: // vehicle
8703  case 0xa0dfac98: // pedestrian
8704  case 0x61a741e: // ped
8705  case 0xef59c100: // gameobject
8706  case 0x5b8ab877: // skater
8707  case 0x19b1e241: // ParticleEmitter
8708  case 0x9e7d469e: // ParticleObject
8709  {
8710  SActionData_NodeIndex Data;
8711  Data.NodeIndex = nodeIndex;
8712  if ( invisible )
8713  {
8714  SetUpActionData( &Data.actionData, Obj::CMovingObject::vINVISIBLE, ACTION_SET_OBJECT_FLAG );
8715  }
8716  else
8717  {
8718  SetUpActionData( &Data.actionData, Obj::CMovingObject::vINVISIBLE, ACTION_CLEAR_OBJECT_FLAG );
8719  }
8720  Data.NodeIndex = nodeIndex;
8721  skate_mod->GetObjectManager()->ProcessAllObjects(Action_ByNodeIndex,&Data);
8722  if ( !Data.actionData.ObjectFound )
8723  {
8724  Dbg_Message( "Vis/Invis: Object from node %d not found.", nodeIndex );
8725  }
8726  break;
8727  }
8728  case 0xb7b3bd86: // LevelObject
8729  case 0xbf4d3536: // LevelGeometry
8730  {
8731  uint32 checksumName = 0;
8732  //Dbg_MsgAssert( ( "No world in viewer module..." ));
8733 
8734  if ( pNode->GetChecksum( 0xa1dc81f9, &checksumName ) ) // checksum 'name'
8735  {
8736 // Nx::CSector *p_sector = Nx::CEngine::sGetSector(checksumName);
8737  // We only want to get sectors from the main scene, as that is what the node array applies to
8738  Nx::CScene * p_main_scene = Nx::CEngine::sGetMainScene();
8739  Nx::CSector *p_sector = p_main_scene->GetSector(checksumName);
8740  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_sector,("sGetSector(0x%x) returned NULL (%s)",checksumName,Script::FindChecksumName(checksumName)));
8741 
8742  uint32 orig_flag = p_sector->GetVisibility();
8743  uint32 flag = 0x1;
8744  if (viewport_number == 1)
8745  {
8746  flag = 0x2;
8747  }
8748  if ( invisible )
8749  {
8750  p_sector->SetVisibility(orig_flag & ~flag); // clear flags
8751  //Bsp::SetWorldSectorFlag( checksumName, flag );
8752  }
8753  else
8754  {
8755  p_sector->SetVisibility(orig_flag | flag); // set flags
8756  //Bsp::ClearWorldSectorFlag( checksumName, flag );
8757  }
8758  }
8759  break;
8760  }
8761 
8762 // case 0xe594f0a2: // Trigger (geometry containing triggers...)
8763  case 0x8e6b02ad: // railnode
8764  case CRCC(0x30c19600, "ClimbingNode"):
8765  default:
8766  return ( false );
8767  break;
8768  }
8769  return ( true );
8770 }
8771 
8772 /******************************************************************/
8773 /* */
8774 /* */
8775 /******************************************************************/
8776 
8777 bool ScriptCheckExistenceFromNodeIndex( int nodeIndex )
8778 {
8779  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
8780 
8781  Script::CArray *pNodeArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD(0xc472ecc5,"NodeArray") );
8782  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNodeArray,( "No NodeArray found" ));
8783 
8784  Script::CStruct *pNode=pNodeArray->GetStructure( nodeIndex );
8785  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNode,( "NULL pNode" ));
8786 
8787  uint32 ClassChecksum = 0;
8788  pNode->GetChecksum( 0x12b4e660 /*"Class"*/, &ClassChecksum );
8789 
8790  switch (ClassChecksum)
8791  {
8792  case 0xe47f1b79: // vehicle
8793  case 0xa0dfac98: // pedestrian
8794  case 0x61a741e: // ped
8795  case 0xef59c100: // gameobject
8796  case 0x5b8ab877: // skater
8797  case 0xb7b3bd86: // LevelObject
8798  case 0x19b1e241: // ParticleEmitter
8799  case 0x9e7d469e: // ParticleObject
8800 
8801  {
8802  SActionData_NodeIndex Data;
8803  Data.NodeIndex = nodeIndex;
8804  SetUpActionData( &Data.actionData, 0, ACTION_SEE_IF_OBJECT_EXISTS );
8805  Data.NodeIndex = nodeIndex;
8806  skate_mod->GetObjectManager()->ProcessAllObjects(Action_ByNodeIndex,&Data);
8807  if ( !Data.actionData.ObjectFound )
8808  {
8809  return ( false );
8810  }
8811  return ( true );
8812  break;
8813  }
8814  case 0xbf4d3536: // LevelGeometry
8815  {
8816  uint32 checksumName = 0;
8817  //Dbg_MsgAssert( ( "No world in viewer module..." ));
8818  if ( pNode->GetChecksum( 0xa1dc81f9, &checksumName ) ) // checksum 'name'
8819  {
8820 // Nx::CSector *p_sector = Nx::CEngine::sGetSector(checksumName);
8821  // We only want to get sectors from the main scene, as that is what the node array applies to
8822  Nx::CScene * p_main_scene = Nx::CEngine::sGetMainScene();
8823  Nx::CSector *p_sector = p_main_scene->GetSector(checksumName);
8824  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_sector,("sGetSector(0x%x) returned NULL (%s)",checksumName,Script::FindChecksumName(checksumName)));
8825  return (p_sector->IsActive());
8826  //return ( Bsp::WorldSectorIsAlive( checksumName ) );
8827  }
8828  break;
8829  }
8830 
8831  case 0xe594f0a2: // Trigger (geometry containing triggers...)
8832  break;
8833 
8834  case CRCC(0x30c19600, "ClimbingNode"):
8835  case 0x8e6b02ad: // railnode
8836  return ( skate_mod->GetRailManager()->IsActive( nodeIndex ) );
8837  break;
8838 
8839  default:
8840  return ( false );
8841  break;
8842  }
8843  return ( true );
8844 }
8845 
8846 
8847 
8848 /******************************************************************/
8849 /* */
8850 /* */
8851 /******************************************************************/
8852 
8853 bool ScriptSetColorFromNodeIndex( int nodeIndex, Script::CStruct *pParams )
8854 {
8855 
8856  uint32 color = 0x808080;
8857 
8858  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x99a9b716,"color"), (int*)&color, TRUE );
8859 
8860  Image::RGBA rgb;
8861  rgb.r = (uint8)((color)&0xff);
8862  rgb.g = (uint8)((color>>8)&0xff);
8863  rgb.b = (uint8)((color>>16)&0xff);
8864  rgb.a = 0x80;
8865 
8866  Script::CArray *pNodeArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD(0xc472ecc5,"NodeArray") );
8867  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNodeArray,( "No NodeArray found" ));
8868 
8869  Script::CStruct *pNode=pNodeArray->GetStructure( nodeIndex );
8870  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNode,( "NULL pNode" ));
8871 
8872  uint32 ClassChecksum = 0;
8873  pNode->GetChecksum( 0x12b4e660 /*"Class"*/, &ClassChecksum );
8874 
8875  switch (ClassChecksum)
8876  {
8877  case 0xbf4d3536: // LevelGeometry
8878  {
8879  uint32 checksumName = 0;
8880  //Dbg_MsgAssert( ( "No world in viewer module..." ));
8881  if ( pNode->GetChecksum( 0xa1dc81f9, &checksumName ) ) // checksum 'name'
8882  {
8883  Nx::CScene * p_main_scene = Nx::CEngine::sGetMainScene();
8884  Nx::CSector *p_sector = p_main_scene->GetSector(checksumName);
8885  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_sector,("sGetSector(0x%x) returned NULL (%s)",checksumName,Script::FindChecksumName(checksumName)));
8886  p_sector->SetColor(rgb);
8887 
8888  }
8889  break;
8890  }
8891  default:
8892  return ( false );
8893  break;
8894  }
8895  return ( true );
8896 }
8897 
8898 
8899 
8900 /******************************************************************/
8901 /* */
8902 /* */
8903 /******************************************************************/
8904 
8905 bool ScriptShatterFromNodeIndex( int nodeIndex )
8906 {
8907 
8908 
8909  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
8910 
8911 // Mick: If pre-running scripts in a net game, we might shatter a lot of glass
8912 // which might run out of memory
8913 // so don't actually shatter the sector if that's what we are doing
8914 
8915  if( skate_mod->LaunchingQueuedScripts())
8916  {
8917  return true;
8918  }
8919 
8920  Script::CArray *pNodeArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD(0xc472ecc5,"NodeArray") );
8921  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNodeArray,( "No NodeArray found" ));
8922 
8923  Script::CStruct *pNode=pNodeArray->GetStructure( nodeIndex );
8924  Dbg_MsgAssert( pNode,( "NULL pNode" ));
8925 
8926  // If this is a net game, don't show/hide objects that were meant to be left out for
8927  // performance/bandwidth/gameplay reasons
8928  if ( skate_mod->ShouldBeAbsentNode( pNode ) )
8929  {
8930  return true;
8931  }
8932 
8933  uint32 ClassChecksum = 0;
8934  pNode->GetChecksum( 0x12b4e660 /*"Class"*/, &ClassChecksum );
8935 
8936  switch( ClassChecksum )
8937  {
8938  case 0xb7b3bd86: // LevelObject
8939  case 0xbf4d3536: // LevelGeometry
8940  {
8941  //Dbg_MsgAssert( p_world,( "No world in viewer module..." ));
8942 
8943  uint32 checksumName = 0;
8944  if( pNode->GetChecksum( 0xa1dc81f9, &checksumName )) // checksum 'name'
8945  {
8946 // Nx::CSector *p_sector = Nx::CEngine::sGetSector(checksumName);
8947  // We only want to get sectors from the main scene, as that is what the node array applies to
8948  Nx::CScene * p_main_scene = Nx::CEngine::sGetMainScene();
8949  Nx::CSector *p_sector = p_main_scene->GetSector(checksumName);
8950  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_sector,("sGetSector(0x%x) returned NULL (%s)",checksumName,Script::FindChecksumName(checksumName)));
8951  p_sector->SetShatter(true);
8952  //Bsp::ShatterWorldSector( checksumName );
8953  }
8954  break;
8955  }
8956 
8957  default:
8958  {
8959  return false;
8960  break;
8961  }
8962  }
8963  return true;
8964 }
8965 
8966 /******************************************************************/
8967 /* */
8968 /* */
8969 /******************************************************************/
8970 
8971 // @script | MakeSkaterGoto |
8972 // This will cause the main skater script to jump to the
8973 // specified script. So a script triggered from a trigger poly
8974 // can use this to force the main skater script to jump to a script.
8975 // It will choose the skater that triggered the poly in that case. <nl>
8976 // <nl>
8977 // A script not associated with an object can also use this, in which
8978 // case it will set the script of skater 0. <nl>
8979 // <nl>
8980 // The main skater script itself could also use it, but there would be
8981 // no point since it can use Goto. <nl>
8982 // <nl>
8983 // This should be used with care, since making the skater jump to a
8984 // script when he's in the middle of doing something could confuse him.
8985 // Eg, forcing him to jump to OnGroundAI when he's on a rail will make
8986 // an assert go off.
8987 // @uparm name | Script name
8988 // @parmopt structure | params | | parameters to be passed to new script
8989 bool ScriptMakeSkaterGoto(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
8990 {
8991 
8992 
8993  Script::CStruct *pParamsToPass=NULL;
8994  pParams->GetStructure(CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"),&pParamsToPass);
8995 
8996  uint32 ScriptChecksum=0;
8997  pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME,&ScriptChecksum);
8998  Dbg_MsgAssert(ScriptChecksum,("\n%s\nMakeSkaterGoto requires a script name, eg MakeSkaterGoto Blaa",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
8999 
9000  Obj::CSkater *pSkater=NULL;
9001  if (pScript && pScript->mpObject && pScript->mpObject->GetType()==SKATE_TYPE_SKATER)
9002  {
9003  // If the script using this has an object associated with it, and that object
9004  // is a skater, then use that skater.
9005  // This will happen in the case of a trigger script using this command.
9006  pSkater=(Obj::CSkater*)pScript->mpObject.Convert();
9007  }
9008  else
9009  {
9010  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9011  int Skater=0;
9012  if( pParams->GetInteger("Skater",&Skater))
9013  {
9014  pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(Skater);
9015  }
9016  else
9017  {
9018  pSkater = skate_mod->GetLocalSkater();
9019  }
9020  }
9021 
9022  if (pSkater && pSkater->IsLocalClient())
9023  {
9024  pSkater->JumpToScript(ScriptChecksum,pParamsToPass);
9025  }
9026 
9027  return true;
9028 }
9029 
9030 /******************************************************************/
9031 /* */
9032 /* */
9033 /******************************************************************/
9034 
9035 // @script | MakeSkaterGotoSub | interrupts whatever script the skater is doing,
9036 // calls new script, and then returns to the original script.
9037 // @uparm name | script to goto
9038 // @parmopt structure | Params | | parameters to pass to new script
9039 // @parmopt int | Skater | |
9040 bool ScriptMakeSkaterGosub(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9041 {
9042 
9043  Script::CStruct *pParamsToPass=NULL;
9044  pParams->GetStructure(CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"),&pParamsToPass);
9045 
9046  uint32 ScriptChecksum=0;
9047  pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME,&ScriptChecksum);
9048  Dbg_MsgAssert(ScriptChecksum,("\n%s\nMakeSkaterGosub requires a script name, eg MakeSkaterGosub Blaa",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
9049 
9050  Obj::CSkater *pSkater=NULL;
9051  if (pScript && pScript->mpObject && pScript->mpObject->GetType()==SKATE_TYPE_SKATER)
9052  {
9053  // If the script using this has an object associated with it, and that object
9054  // is a skater, then use that skater.
9055  // This will happen in the case of a trigger script using this command.
9056  pSkater=(Obj::CSkater*)pScript->mpObject.Convert();
9057  }
9058  else
9059  {
9060  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9061  int Skater=0;
9062  pParams->GetInteger("Skater",&Skater);
9063  pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(Skater);
9064  }
9065 
9066  if (pSkater)
9067  {
9068  pSkater->CallScript(ScriptChecksum,pParamsToPass);
9069  }
9070 
9071  return true;
9072 }
9073 
9074 /******************************************************************/
9075 /* */
9076 /* */
9077 /******************************************************************/
9078 
9079 // @script | SpawnScript | This will create & run a new script which will
9080 // run -in parallel- until it finishes, when it will die. The new script
9081 // is not associated with any object. The calling script is not affected
9082 // in any way. A typical use of a spawned script would be to play a sound,
9083 // pause, play another sound, etc, for example when an object dies. This
9084 // way the object itself can die straight away
9085 // @uparm name | the name of the script to spawn
9086 // @parmopt structure | Params | | Parameter structure to pass to new script
9087 // @parmopt name | Id | | an id to assign to the spawned script, so it can
9088 // be killed by KillSpawnedScript
9089 // @flag NotSessionSpecific | This will cause the script to not get deleted when the current
9090 // level (session) ends.
9091 bool ScriptSpawnScript(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9092 {
9093  uint32 ScriptChecksum=0;
9094  pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME,&ScriptChecksum);
9095  Dbg_MsgAssert(ScriptChecksum,("\n%s\nMissing script name in SpawnScript command.",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
9096  bool net_enabled, permanent;
9097  Script::CStruct *pScriptParams=NULL;
9098  pParams->GetStructure(CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"),&pScriptParams);
9099 
9100  // The spawned script can optionally be given an Id, so that it can be deleted
9101  // by KillSpawnedScript.
9102  uint32 Id=0;
9103  pParams->GetChecksum("Id",&Id);
9104 
9105  uint32 CallbackScript=0;
9106  pParams->GetChecksum("Callback",&CallbackScript);
9107  Script::CStruct *pCallbackParams=NULL;
9108  pParams->GetStructure("CallbackParams",&pCallbackParams);
9109 
9110  //net_enabled = 0;
9111  //permanent = 0;
9112  //pParams->GetInteger( "NetEnabled", &net_enabled );
9113  //pParams->GetInteger( "Permanent", &permanent );
9114  net_enabled = pParams->ContainsFlag( "NetEnabled" );
9115  permanent = pParams->ContainsFlag( "Permanent" );
9116 
9117  int not_session_specific=0;
9118  pParams->GetInteger( "NotSessionSpecific", &not_session_specific);
9119 
9120  // copy the parent's node
9121  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
9122  Script::CScript *p_script=Script::SpawnScript(ScriptChecksum,pScriptParams,CallbackScript,pCallbackParams,
9123  pScript->mNode,
9124  Id,
9125  net_enabled,
9126  permanent,
9127  not_session_specific);
9128  p_script->SetCommentString("Spawned by script command SpawnScript");
9129  p_script->SetOriginatingScriptInfo(pScript->GetCurrentLineNumber(),pScript->mScriptChecksum);
9130  #else
9131  Script::SpawnScript(ScriptChecksum,pScriptParams,CallbackScript,pCallbackParams,
9132  pScript->mNode,
9133  Id,
9134  net_enabled,
9135  permanent,
9136  not_session_specific);
9137  #endif
9138  return true;
9139 }
9140 
9141 
9142 
9143 // @script | SpawnSound | This will create & run a new script which will
9144 // run -in parallel- until it finishes, when it will die. The new script
9145 // is not associated with any object. The calling script is not affected
9146 // in any way. A typical use of a spawned script would be to play a sound,
9147 // pause, play another sound, etc, for example when an object dies. This
9148 // way the object itself can die straight away
9149 //
9150 // Note, this is the same as SpawnScript, except if the current script is
9151 // attached to an object, then we do the same as Obj_SpawnScript
9152 // So we get attached to the object
9153 //
9154 // @uparm name | the name of the script to spawn
9155 // @parmopt structure | Params | | Parameter structure to pass to new script
9156 // @parmopt name | Id | | an id to assign to the spawned script, so it can
9157 // be killed by KillSpawnedScript
9158 bool ScriptSpawnSound(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9159 {
9160 
9161  if (pScript->mpObject)
9162  {
9163  uint32 scriptChecksum;
9164  if ( pParams->GetChecksum( NONAME, &scriptChecksum ) )
9165  {
9166  // The spawned script can optionally be given an Id, so that it can be deleted
9167  // by KillSpawnedScript.
9168  uint32 Id=0;
9169  // keep the same ID as the parent if not specified...
9170  Id = Script::FindSpawnedScriptID(pScript);
9171  pParams->GetChecksum("Id",&Id);
9172  Script::CScriptStructure *pScriptParams = NULL;
9173  pParams->GetStructure( "Params", &pScriptParams );
9174  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
9175  Script::CScript *p_script=pScript->mpObject->SpawnScriptPlease( scriptChecksum, pScriptParams, Id );
9176  p_script->SetCommentString("Created by SpawnSound");
9177  p_script->SetOriginatingScriptInfo(pScript->GetCurrentLineNumber(),pScript->mScriptChecksum);
9178  #else
9179  pScript->mpObject->SpawnScriptPlease( scriptChecksum, pScriptParams, Id );
9180  #endif
9181  }
9182  }
9183  else
9184  {
9185  return ScriptSpawnScript(pParams,pScript);
9186  }
9187  return true;
9188 }
9189 
9190 /******************************************************************/
9191 /* */
9192 /* */
9193 /******************************************************************/
9194 
9195 // @script | SpawnSkaterScript | This will create & run a new script
9196 // on the skater which will run in parallel until it finishes, when it
9197 // will die. The calling script is not affected in any way.
9198 // @uparm name | the name of the script to call
9199 // @parmopt structure | Params | | parameter list to pass to new script
9200 // @parmopt name | Id | | an id to assign to the new script so it can
9201 // be killed by KillSpawnedScript
9202 bool ScriptSpawnSkaterScript(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9203 {
9204 
9205  // Mostly the same as the code for ScriptSpawnScript
9206  uint32 ScriptChecksum=0;
9207  pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME,&ScriptChecksum);
9208  Dbg_MsgAssert(ScriptChecksum,("\n%s\nMissing script name in SpawnSkaterScript command.",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
9209 
9210  Script::CStruct *pScriptParams=NULL;
9211  pParams->GetStructure(CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"),&pScriptParams);
9212 
9213  // The spawned script can optionally be given an Id, so that it can be deleted
9214  // by KillSpawnedScript.
9215  uint32 Id=0;
9216  pParams->GetChecksum("Id",&Id);
9217 
9218  uint32 CallbackScript=0;
9219  pParams->GetChecksum("Callback",&CallbackScript);
9220  Script::CStruct *pCallbackParams=NULL;
9221  pParams->GetStructure("CallbackParams",&pCallbackParams);
9222 
9223  Script::CScript *pNewScript=Script::SpawnScript(ScriptChecksum,pScriptParams,CallbackScript,pCallbackParams,pScript->mNode,Id); // copy the parent's node
9224  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
9225  pNewScript->SetCommentString("Spawned by script command SpawnSkaterScript");
9226  pNewScript->SetOriginatingScriptInfo(pScript->GetCurrentLineNumber(),pScript->mScriptChecksum);
9227  #endif
9228 
9229  // Now set the object pointer to be the skater.
9230  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9231  Obj::CSkater *pSkater = skate_mod->GetLocalSkater();
9232 
9233  pNewScript->mpObject=pSkater;
9234 
9235  return true;
9236 }
9237 
9238 /******************************************************************/
9239 /* */
9240 /* */
9241 /******************************************************************/
9242 
9243 // @script | KillSpawnedScript | can be passed a script name or an id
9244 // @parmopt name | Name | | the name of the script
9245 // @parmopt name | Id | | the id of the script
9246 bool ScriptKillSpawnedScript(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9247 {
9248 
9249  uint32 ScriptChecksum=0;
9250  if (pParams->GetChecksum("Name",&ScriptChecksum))
9251  {
9252  // Got a script name, so kill all spawned scripts that ran that script.
9253  Script::KillSpawnedScriptsThatReferTo(ScriptChecksum);
9254  return true;
9255  }
9256 
9257  uint32 Id=0;
9258  if (pParams->GetChecksum("Id",&Id))
9259  {
9260  // They specified an Id, so kill all spawned scripts with this Id.
9261  Script::KillSpawnedScriptsWithId(Id);
9262  }
9263  return true;
9264 }
9265 
9266 /******************************************************************/
9267 /* */
9268 /* */
9269 /******************************************************************/
9270 
9271 // @script | PauseSkaters | This will cause all skaters to freeze.
9272 // They will continue where they left off when UnPauseSkaters is called.
9273 // Note that this command will not pause any spawned scripts associated
9274 // with the skaters, because otherwise it will pause the camera animation
9275 // script too, which is where the command will probably be used most
9276 bool ScriptPauseSkaters( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9277 {
9278  Replay::WritePauseSkater();
9279 
9280  bool hide = pParams->ContainsFlag("hide");
9281 
9282  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9283  uint32 NumSkaters=skate_mod->GetNumSkaters();
9284  for (uint32 i=0; i<NumSkaters; ++i)
9285  {
9286  Obj::CSkater *pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(i);
9287  if (pSkater && pSkater->IsLocalClient()) // Hmm, assert instead?
9288  {
9289  pSkater->Pause();
9290  pSkater->Hide(hide);
9291  }
9292  }
9293 
9294 
9295  return true;
9296 }
9297 
9298 /******************************************************************/
9299 /* */
9300 /* */
9301 /******************************************************************/
9302 
9303 // @script | UnPauseSkaters | opposite effect of PauseSkaters
9304 bool ScriptUnPauseSkaters( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9305 {
9306  Replay::WriteUnPauseSkater();
9307 
9308  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9309  uint32 NumSkaters=skate_mod->GetNumSkaters();
9310  for (uint32 i=0; i<NumSkaters; ++i)
9311  {
9312  Obj::CSkater *pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(i);
9313  if (pSkater)
9314  {
9315  pSkater->UnPause();
9316  pSkater->Hide(false);
9317  }
9318  }
9319 
9320  return true;
9321 }
9322 
9323 /******************************************************************/
9324 /* */
9325 /* */
9326 /******************************************************************/
9327 
9328 // @script | PauseSkater | this pauses an individual skater
9329 // @uparm 0 | skater id
9330 bool ScriptPauseSkater( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9331 {
9332  bool hide = pParams->ContainsFlag("hide");
9333 
9334  int skater_id;
9335  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &skater_id, true );
9336 
9337  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9338  Obj::CSkater *pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(skater_id);
9339  if (pSkater)
9340  {
9341  pSkater->Pause();
9342  pSkater->Hide(hide);
9343  }
9344 
9345  return true;
9346 }
9347 
9348 /******************************************************************/
9349 /* */
9350 /* */
9351 /******************************************************************/
9352 
9353 // @script | UnPauseSkater | Unpauses an individual skater
9354 // @uparm 0 | skater id
9355 bool ScriptUnPauseSkater( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9356 {
9357 
9358 
9359  int skater_id;
9360  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &skater_id, true );
9361 
9362  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9363  Obj::CSkater *pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(skater_id);
9364  if (pSkater)
9365  {
9366  pSkater->UnPause();
9367  pSkater->Hide(false);
9368  }
9369 
9370  return true;
9371 }
9372 
9373 /******************************************************************/
9374 /* */
9375 /* */
9376 /******************************************************************/
9377 
9378 // @script | PauseGame | Similar to "PauseSkaters", it will pause
9379 // the skaters, and everything else in the world, yet still allow
9380 // you to launch messages and spawn new scripts
9381 bool ScriptPauseGame( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9382 {
9383  Mdl::FrontEnd * front = Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance();
9384  front->PauseGame(true);
9385  // if the script was a spawned script
9386  // then we want to unpause it, so we can keep running after the game has paused
9387  Script::UnpauseSpawnedScript(pScript);
9388  return true;
9389 }
9390 
9391 /******************************************************************/
9392 /* */
9393 /* */
9394 /******************************************************************/
9395 
9396 // @script | UnPauseGame |
9397 bool ScriptUnPauseGame( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9398 {
9399  Mdl::FrontEnd * front = Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance();
9400  front->PauseGame(false);
9401  return true;
9402 }
9403 
9404 /******************************************************************/
9405 /* */
9406 /* */
9407 /******************************************************************/
9408 
9409 // @script | IsGamePaused |
9410 bool ScriptIsGamePaused( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9411 {
9412  Mdl::FrontEnd * front = Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance();
9413  if( front->GamePaused() )
9414  {
9415  return true;
9416  }
9417  return false;
9418 }
9419 
9420 /******************************************************************/
9421 /* */
9422 /* */
9423 /******************************************************************/
9424 
9425 // @script | PauseObjects |
9426 bool ScriptPauseObjects(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9427 {
9428  // Pause all composite objects
9429  Obj::CCompositeObjectManager::Instance()->Pause(true);
9430 
9431  return true;
9432 }
9433 
9434 /******************************************************************/
9435 /* */
9436 /* */
9437 /******************************************************************/
9438 
9439 // @script | UnpauseObjects |
9440 bool ScriptUnPauseObjects(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9441 {
9442  // Unpause all composite objects
9443  Obj::CCompositeObjectManager::Instance()->Pause(false);
9444 
9445  return true;
9446 }
9447 
9448 /******************************************************************/
9449 /* */
9450 /* */
9451 /******************************************************************/
9452 
9453 // @script | PauseSpawnedScripts |
9454 bool ScriptPauseSpawnedScripts(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9455 {
9456  Script::PauseSpawnedScripts(true);
9457 
9458  if ( pScript->mIsSpawned )
9459  {
9460  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "Can't pause spawned scripts from a spawned script" ) );
9461  }
9462 
9463  return true;
9464 }
9465 
9466 /******************************************************************/
9467 /* */
9468 /* */
9469 /******************************************************************/
9470 
9471 // @script | UnPauseSpawnedScripts |
9472 bool ScriptUnPauseSpawnedScripts(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
9473 {
9474  Script::PauseSpawnedScripts(false);
9475 
9476  return true;
9477 }
9478 
9479 /******************************************************************/
9480 /* */
9481 /* */
9482 /******************************************************************/
9483 
9484 // @script | ResetClock |
9485 bool ScriptResetClock( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9486 {
9487  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
9488  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9489  int time_limit;
9490 
9491  // Clients instead get their time limit from the server
9492  if( gamenet_man->OnServer())
9493  {
9494  time_limit = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetTimeLimit();
9495  skate_mod->SetTimeLimit( time_limit );
9496  }
9497 
9498  return true;
9499 }
9500 
9501 /******************************************************************/
9502 /* */
9503 /* */
9504 /******************************************************************/
9505 
9506 // @script | PadsPluggedIn | Returns true if at least one pad is plugged in.
9507 bool ScriptPadsPluggedIn( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9508 {
9509  Mdl::FrontEnd * p_front = Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance();
9510  return p_front->PadsPluggedIn();
9511 }
9512 
9513 /******************************************************************/
9514 /* */
9515 /* */
9516 /******************************************************************/
9517 
9518 // @script | DoFlash | Doflash just draws a big poly over the viewport
9519 // and then modulates the color and alpha of that poly over time. There
9520 // is no support for Blendmodes yet. If you are doing a player specific
9521 // flash remember to call it from a skater script so that it works in 2
9522 // player splitscreen
9523 // @parmopt float | duration | 0.0 |
9524 // @parmopt string | texture | | texture name
9525 // @parmopt float | z | 0.0 | z
9526 // @flag fullscreen |
9527 // @flag behind_panel |
9528 // @flag additive |
9529 // @flag subtractive |
9530 // @parmopt int | skater | | for specifying skater when not in skater script
9531 // @flag ignore_pause |
9532 // @parm int | start_r | start red index
9533 // @parm int | start_g | start green index
9534 // @parm int | start_b | start blue index
9535 // @parm int | start_a | start alpha value
9536 // @parm int | end_r | end red index
9537 // @parm int | end_g | end green index
9538 // @parm int | end_b | end blue index
9539 // @parm int | end_a | end alpha value
9540 bool ScriptDoFlash( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9541 {
9542 
9543 
9544  float duration = 0.0f;
9545  float z = 0.0f;
9546  uint32 flags = 0;
9547  bool fullscreen = false;
9548  int skater_num = -1;
9549  const char* p_texture_name = NULL;
9550 
9551  pParams->GetFloat( "duration", &duration );
9552 
9553  if( duration > 0.0f )
9554  {
9555  pParams->GetText( "texture", &p_texture_name );
9556 
9557  pParams->GetFloat( "z", &z );
9558 
9559 // if( pParams->ContainsFlag( 0xdf6436d2 /*"fullscreen"*/ ))
9560 // {
9561 // flags |= Flash::FLAG_FULLSCREEN;
9562 // fullscreen = true;
9563 // }
9564  if( pParams->ContainsFlag( 0x70ffc649 /*"behind_panel"*/ ))
9565  {
9566  flags |= Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_BEHIND_PANEL;
9567  }
9568  if( pParams->ContainsFlag( 0x19c43cf6 /*"additive"*/ ))
9569  {
9570  flags |= Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_ADDITIVE;
9571  }
9572  else if( pParams->ContainsFlag( 0x387c9ed6 /*"subtractive"*/ ))
9573  {
9574  flags |= Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_SUBTRACTIVE;
9575  }
9576 
9577  if( !fullscreen )
9578  {
9579  pParams->GetInteger( "skater", &skater_num );
9580  if( skater_num == -1 )
9581  {
9582  // No skater parameter provided, so assume running from a skater script.
9583  Obj::CSkater* p_skater = static_cast <Obj::CSkater*>( pScript->mpObject.Convert() );
9584  Dbg_Assert( p_skater );
9585  skater_num = p_skater->GetSkaterNumber();
9586  }
9587  }
9588 
9589  if( pParams->ContainsFlag( 0xdf6436d2 /*"ignore_pause"*/ ))
9590  {
9591  flags |= Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_IGNORE_PAUSE;
9592  }
9593 
9594  int val = 0;
9595  Image::RGBA from, to;
9596 
9597  pParams->GetInteger( "start_r", &val );
9598  from.r = val;
9599  pParams->GetInteger( "start_g", &val );
9600  from.g = val;
9601  pParams->GetInteger( "start_b", &val );
9602  from.b = val;
9603  pParams->GetInteger( "start_a", &val );
9604  from.a = val;
9605 
9606  pParams->GetInteger( "end_r", &val );
9607  to.r = val;
9608  pParams->GetInteger( "end_g", &val );
9609  to.g = val;
9610  pParams->GetInteger( "end_b", &val );
9611  to.b = val;
9612  pParams->GetInteger( "end_a", &val );
9613  to.a = val;
9614 
9615  if( fullscreen )
9616  {
9617  }
9618  else
9619  {
9620  Nx::AddScreenFlash( skater_num, from, to, duration, z, flags, p_texture_name );
9621 
9622  // Get the panel for player.
9623  //HUD::PanelMgr* panel_mgr = HUD::PanelMgr::Instance();
9624  //HUD::Panel* p_panel = panel_mgr->GetPanelBySkaterId( skater_num );
9625  //p_panel->AddFlash( from, to, duration, z, flags, p_texture_name );
9626  }
9627  }
9628  return true;
9629 }
9630 
9631 /******************************************************************/
9632 /* */
9633 /* */
9634 /******************************************************************/
9635 
9636 // @script | StartServer | Starts a server using the IP stored in
9637 // the script variable LocalIP, which you also have to define. You
9638 // can also define a script variable called ServerName to name your
9639 // server (i.e. ServerName = MyServer with a max of 15 characters
9640 bool ScriptStartServer(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9641 {
9642 
9643 
9644  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9645  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
9646 
9647  // set the appropriate memory context
9648  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().BottomUpHeap());
9649 
9650  skate_mod->StartServer();
9651 
9652  if (gamenet_man->InInternetMode())
9653  {
9654  // defer loading the level/starting the game
9655  // until we have connected to the matchmaker
9656  //gamenet_man->RequestMatchmakerConnect();
9657 
9658  // SG: 9-17-02. Post the game AFTER we're in our first level
9659  //gamenet_man->PostGame();
9660  }
9661  else if (gamenet_man->InLanMode())
9662  {
9663  // if we're in LAN mode, start the game immediately
9664  }
9665 
9666  // pop the memory context
9667  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
9668 
9669  return true;
9670 }
9671

9673 /* */
9674 /* */

9679 {

9683 
9684  return true;
9685 }

9692 // @script | FindServers | broadcast out to the local subnet for servers
9693 bool ScriptFindServers(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )

9696 
9697  //skate_mod->FindServers();
9698  return true;
9699 }
9700 
9701 /******************************************************************/
9702 /* */
9703 /* */
9704 /******************************************************************/
9705 
9706 // @script | JoinServer | Join the server in session at the given IP address and port
9707 // @uparm "string" | ip address
9708 // @uparm 1 | port
9709 bool ScriptJoinServer(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9710 {
9711  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
9712  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
9713 
9714  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().BottomUpHeap());
9715 
9716  if( gamenet_man->OnServer())
9717  {
9718  uint32 i;
9719 
9720  // If playing split screen, create N clients (one for each viewport
9721  // otherwise, just create one client
9722 // gamenet_man->SpawnClient( false, true, 0 );
9723 
9724  uint32 numPlayers = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetInitialNumberOfPlayers();
9725 
9726  for( i = 0; i < numPlayers; i++ )
9727  {
9728  Net::Client* client;
9729 
9730  client = gamenet_man->SpawnClient( false, true, true, i );
9731 
9732  //skate_mod->JoinServer( false, 0, 0, true, i );
9733  gamenet_man->JoinServer( false, 0, 0, i );
9734  skate_mod->AddNetworkMsgHandlers( client, i );
9735  if( gamenet_man->InNetGame())
9736  {
9737  Script::RunScript( "entered_network_game" );
9738  }
9739  }
9740  }
9741  else
9742  {
9743  /*int max_players;
9744  pParams->GetInteger( Script::GenerateCRC( "MaxPlayers" ), (int *) &max_players );
9745  skate_mod->GetGameMode()->SetMaximumNumberOfPlayers( max_players );
9746 
9747  Dbg_Printf( "**** SETTING MAX PLAYERS TO %d\n", max_players );
9748  Dbg_Assert( skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetMaximumNumberOfPlayers() == (uint32) max_players );*/
9749 
9750 #ifdef __PLAT_XBOX__
9751  IN_ADDR host_addr;
9752  int port = 0;
9753  bool observe_only;
9754 
9755  pParams->GetInteger( Script::GenerateCRC( "Address" ), (int *) &host_addr.s_addr );
9756  pParams->GetInteger( Script::GenerateCRC( "Port" ), &port );
9757  observe_only = ( gamenet_man->GetJoinMode() == GameNet::vJOIN_MODE_OBSERVE );
9758 
9759  if( port != 0 )
9760  {
9761  gamenet_man->SpawnClient( false, false, true, 0 );
9762  gamenet_man->JoinServer( observe_only, (unsigned long) host_addr.s_addr, port, 0 );
9763  }
9764 #else
9765  const char *server_ip = NULL;
9766  int port = 0;
9767  bool observe_only;
9768 
9769  pParams->GetText( NONAME, &server_ip );
9770  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &port );
9771  observe_only = ( gamenet_man->GetJoinMode() == GameNet::vJOIN_MODE_OBSERVE );
9772 
9773  if( server_ip && ( port != 0 ))
9774  {
9775  gamenet_man->SpawnClient( false, false, true, 0 );
9776  gamenet_man->JoinServer( observe_only, inet_addr( server_ip ), port, 0 );
9777  }
9778 #endif
9779  }
9780 
9781  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
9782 
9783  return true;
9784 }
9785 
9786 /******************************************************************/
9787 /* */
9788 /* */
9789 /******************************************************************/
9790 
9791 // @script | SetNetworkMode | sets the network mode
9792 // @uparm 0 | mode
9793 bool ScriptSetNetworkMode( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9794 {
9795  int mode = 0;
9796  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
9797 
9798  mode = 0;
9799  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &mode );
9800  if( mode == 0 )
9801  {
9802  gamenet_man->SetNetworkMode( GameNet::vNO_NET_MODE );
9803  }
9804  else if( mode == 1 )
9805  {
9806  gamenet_man->SetNetworkMode( GameNet::vLAN_MODE );
9807  }
9808  else if( mode == 2 )
9809  {
9810  gamenet_man->SetNetworkMode( GameNet::vINTERNET_MODE );
9811  }
9812 
9813  return true;
9814 }

9842

9860 /******************************************************************/
9861 /* */
9862 /* */
9863 /******************************************************************/
9864 
9865 bool ScriptTestNetSetup( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9866 {
9867  Net::Manager * net_man = Net::Manager::Instance();
9868  bool properly_setup;
9869 
9870  properly_setup = net_man->NetworkEnvironmentSetup();
9871  if( !properly_setup )
9872  {
9873  if( net_man->GetLastError() == Net::vRES_ERROR_DEVICE_NOT_HOT )
9874  {
9875  pParams->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC( "text" ), ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING, Script::GetString( "net_error_not_connected" ));
9876  Script::RunScript( "create_net_startup_error_dialog", pParams );
9877  }
9878  else if( net_man->GetLastError() == Net::vRES_ERROR_DEVICE_NOT_CONNECTED )
9879  {
9880  pParams->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC( "text" ), ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING, Script::GetString( "net_error_device_error" ));
9881  Script::RunScript( "create_net_startup_error_dialog", pParams );
9882  }
9883  else if( net_man->GetLastError() == Net::vRES_ERROR_UNKNOWN_DEVICE )
9884  {
9885  pParams->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC( "text" ), ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING, Script::GetString( "net_error_not_detected" ));
9886  Script::RunScript( "create_net_startup_error_dialog", pParams );
9887  }
9888  else if( net_man->GetLastError() == Net::vRES_ERROR_DHCP )
9889  {
9890  pParams->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC( "text" ), ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING, Script::GetString( "net_error_dhcp_error" ));
9891  Script::RunScript( "create_net_startup_error_dialog", pParams );
9892  }
9893  else if( net_man->GetLastError() == Net::vRES_ERROR_DEVICE_CHANGED )
9894  {
9895  pParams->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC( "text" ), ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING, Script::GetString( "net_error_changed_device" ));
9896  Script::RunScript( "create_net_startup_error_dialog", pParams );
9897  }
9898  else
9899  {
9900  pParams->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC( "text" ), ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING, Script::GetString( "net_error_general_error" ));
9901  Script::RunScript( "create_net_startup_error_dialog", pParams );
9902  }
9903  }
9904  else
9905  {
9906  uint32 success_script;
9907 
9908  pParams->GetChecksum( "success_script", &success_script, true );
9909  Dbg_Printf( "***** SUCCESS! RUNNING SCRIPT %p\n", success_script );
9910  Script::RunScript( success_script, pParams );
9911 
9912  /*Script::CStruct* pParams;
9913 
9914  Script::RunScript( "dialog_box_exit" );
9915  //Script::RunScript( "launch_network_select_menu" );
9916 
9917  pParams = new Script::CStruct;
9918 
9919  pParams->AddChecksum( "change_gamemode", Script::GenerateCRC( "change_gamemode_net" ));
9920  Script::RunScript( "launch_select_skater_menu", pParams );
9921 
9922  delete pParams;*/
9923  }
9924 
9925  return properly_setup;
9926 }
9927

9957 // @script | ConnectToInternet |
9958 bool ScriptConnectToInternet( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
9959 {
9960  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
9961  uint32 success, failure;
9962 
9963  success = 0;
9964  failure = 0;
9965 
9966  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x90ff204d,"success"), &success );
9967  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xde64fc3e,"failure"), &failure );
9968 
9969  return gamenet_man->ConnectToInternet( success, failure );
9970 }

10036 // @script | StopAllScripts | This will cause all scripts in existence

10039 // command will stop all scripts in existence at the moment it is called,

10076 /******************************************************************/
10077 /* */
10078 /* */
10079 /******************************************************************/
10080 
10081 static bool FirstTimeThisIsCalled_Flag=true;
10082 // @script | FirstTimeThisIsCalled | returns true the first time this is called
10083 bool ScriptFirstTimeThisIsCalled(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10084 {
10085 
10086  if (FirstTimeThisIsCalled_Flag)
10087  {
10088  FirstTimeThisIsCalled_Flag=false;
10089  return true;
10090  }
10091  return false;
10092 }
10093 
10094 /******************************************************************/
10095 /* */
10096 /* */
10097 /******************************************************************/
10098 
10099 // @script | EnableActuators |
10100 // @uparm 1 | 1 for enable - 0 for disable. 1 is the default
10101 bool ScriptEnableActuators(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10102 {
10103  int on = 1;
10104  pParams->GetInteger(NONAME,&on);
10105  Inp::Manager * input_man = Inp::Manager::Instance();
10106  Mdl::Skate * pSkate = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10107  for (int i=0; i< SIO::vMAX_DEVICES; ++i)
10108  {
10109  if ( pSkate->mp_controller_preferences[i].VibrationOn )
10110  {
10111  if (on)
10112  {
10113  input_man->EnableActuator(i);
10114  }
10115  else
10116  {
10117  input_man->DisableActuator(i);
10118  }
10119  }
10120  }
10121 
10122  return true;
10123 }
10124 
10125 
10126 /******************************************************************/
10127 /* */
10128 /* */
10129 /******************************************************************/
10130 
10131 // @script | InNetGame | returns true if we're in a net game
10132 bool ScriptInNetGame(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10133 {
10134  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10135 
10136  return gamenet_man->InNetGame();
10137 }
10138 
10139 /******************************************************************/
10140 /* */
10141 /* */
10142 /******************************************************************/
10143 
10144 // @script | IsObserving | You can now use the "IsObserving" script
10145 // command to perform logic (ex. hide objects) if the player is
10146 // Observing a network game.
10147 bool ScriptIsObserving( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
10148 {
10149  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10150  GameNet::PlayerInfo* player;
10151  GameNet::NewPlayerInfo* new_player;
10152  Lst::Search< GameNet::NewPlayerInfo > sh;
10153 
10154  if(( player = gamenet_man->GetLocalPlayer()))
10155  {
10156  return player->IsObserving();
10157  }
10158 
10159  // If we're observing, we need to remove our skater
10160  for( new_player = gamenet_man->FirstNewPlayerInfo( sh ); new_player; new_player = gamenet_man->NextNewPlayerInfo( sh ))
10161  {
10162  if( new_player->Flags & GameNet::PlayerInfo::mLOCAL_PLAYER )
10163  {
10164  if( new_player->Flags & GameNet::PlayerInfo::mOBSERVER )
10165  {
10166  return true;
10167  }
10168  }
10169  }
10170 
10171  return( gamenet_man->GetJoinMode() == GameNet::vJOIN_MODE_OBSERVE );
10172 }
10173 
10174 /******************************************************************/
10175 /* */
10176 /* */
10177 /******************************************************************/
10178 
10179 // @script | SkatersAreReady | true if all skaters connected to the server
10180 // are done loading
10181 bool ScriptSkatersAreReady(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10182 {
10183  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10184  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10185 
10186  // poll the server to find out whether the skaters are done loading
10187  if( gamenet_man->ReadyToPlay() &&
10188  ( ( skate_mod->GetNumSkaters() > 0 ) ||
10189  ( ScriptIsObserving( NULL, NULL ))))
10190  {
10191  return true;
10192  }
10193 
10194  return false;
10195 }
10196

10198 /* */
10199 /* */
10200 /******************************************************************/

10205 {
10206  float slomo = 1.0f;
10207  pParams->GetFloat(NONAME,&slomo);
10208  Tmr::SetSlomo(slomo);
10209  return true;
10210 }

10251  }

10270 /******************************************************************/
10271 /* */
10272 /* */
10273 /******************************************************************/
10274 
10275 // @script | DumpNetMessageStats | displays all net message stats
10276 bool ScriptDumpNetMessageStats( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
10277 {
10278  Net::Conn* conn;
10279  Lst::Search< Net::Conn > sh;
10280  Net::App* app;
10281  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10282 #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
10283  Net::Manager * net_man = Net::Manager::Instance();
10284 #endif // __NOPT_ASSERT__
10285  int i, j, total_size, total_num, size, num;
10286  Net::Metrics* metrics;
10287 
10288  app = gamenet_man->GetServer();
10289  if( app == NULL )
10290  {
10291  app = gamenet_man->GetClient( 0 );
10292  }
10293 
10294  if( app == NULL )
10295  {
10296  return true;
10297  }
10298 
10299  i = 0;
10300  for( conn = app->FirstConnection( &sh ); conn; conn = app->NextConnection( &sh ))
10301  {
10302  metrics = conn->GetInboundMetrics();
10303  Dbg_Printf( "Conn %d inbound stats:\n", i );
10304  total_size = 0;
10305  total_num = 0;
10306  for( j = 0; j < 256; j++ )
10307  {
10308  total_size += metrics->GetTotalMessageData( j );
10309  total_num += metrics->GetTotalNumMessagesOfId( j );
10310  }
10311 
10312  // Guard against dbz
10313  if( total_size == 0 )
10314  {
10315  total_size = 1;
10316  }
10317 
10318  for( j = 0; j < 256; j++ )
10319  {
10320  size = metrics->GetTotalMessageData( j );
10321  num = metrics->GetTotalNumMessagesOfId( j );
10322 
10323  if( num > 0 )
10324  {
10325 # ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
10326  Dbg_Printf( "[%d-%s] Num: %d Size: %d Pct: %02f\n", j, net_man->GetMessageName( j ),
10327  num, size, (float) size/(float) total_size );
10328 # endif // __NOPT_ASSERT__
10329  }
10330  }
10331 
10332  metrics = conn->GetOutboundMetrics();
10333  Dbg_Printf( "Conn %d outbound stats:\n", i );
10334  total_size = 0;
10335  total_num = 0;
10336  for( j = 0; j < 256; j++ )
10337  {
10338  total_size += metrics->GetTotalMessageData( j );
10339  total_num += metrics->GetTotalNumMessagesOfId( j );
10340  }
10341 
10342  // Guard against dbz
10343  if( total_size == 0 )
10344  {
10345  total_size = 1;
10346  }
10347 
10348  for( j = 0; j < 256; j++ )
10349  {
10350  size = metrics->GetTotalMessageData( j );
10351  num = metrics->GetTotalNumMessagesOfId( j );
10352 
10353  if( num > 0 )
10354  {
10355 # ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
10356  Dbg_Printf( "[%d-%s] Num: %d Size: %d Pct: %02f\n", j, net_man->GetMessageName( j ),
10357  num, size, (float) size/(float) total_size );
10358 # endif // __NOPT_ASSERT__
10359  }
10360  }
10361  i++;
10362  }
10363  return true;
10364 }
10365 
10366 /******************************************************************/
10367 /* */
10368 /* */
10369 /******************************************************************/
10370 
10371 // @script | SetServerMode | sets the server mode
10372 // @flag off |
10373 bool ScriptSetServerMode(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10374 {
10375  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10376  bool off = pParams->ContainsFlag("off");
10377 
10378  gamenet_man->SetServerMode( !off );
10379 
10380  return true;
10381 }
10382 
10383 /******************************************************************/
10384 /* */
10385 /* */
10386 /******************************************************************/
10387 
10388 // @script | NotifyBailDone |
10389 bool ScriptNotifyBailDone( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
10390 {
10391  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10392  Net::Client* client;
10393 
10394  Obj::CSkater *pSkater=NULL;
10395  if( pScript && pScript->mpObject && pScript->mpObject->GetType() == SKATE_TYPE_SKATER )
10396  {
10397  // If the script using this has an object associated with it, and that object
10398  // is a skater, then use that skater.
10399  pSkater= (Obj::CSkater *) pScript->mpObject.Convert();
10400  }
10401 
10402  if( pSkater && pSkater->IsLocalClient())
10403  {
10404  client = gamenet_man->GetClient( pSkater->GetSkaterNumber());
10405  if( client )
10406  {
10407  Net::MsgDesc msg_desc;
10408 
10409  msg_desc.m_Id = GameNet::MSG_ID_BAIL_DONE;
10410  msg_desc.m_Queue = Net::QUEUE_SEQUENCED;
10411  msg_desc.m_GroupId = GameNet::vSEQ_GROUP_PLAYER_MSGS;
10412  client->EnqueueMessageToServer( &msg_desc );
10413  }
10414  }
10415 
10416  return true;
10417 }
10418 
10419 /******************************************************************/
10420 /* */
10421 /* */
10422 /******************************************************************/
10423 
10424 // @script | DisplayLoadingScreen | shows the loading screen
10425 // @uparm "string" | name of the screen to display
10426 // @uparmopt time | the amount of time to display loading bar (default is 0, meaning no loading bar)
10427 // @flag Freeze | just freeze current screen
10428 // @flag Blank | clear screen to black
10429 bool ScriptDisplayLoadingScreen( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
10430 {
10431 
10432  const char *pScreen = "images\\xxxxx";
10433  pParams->GetText(NONAME,&pScreen);
10434 
10435  Nx::CLoadScreen::sDisplay( (char*) pScreen, pParams->ContainsFlag(CRCD(0xb96e0be5,"Freeze")),pParams->ContainsFlag(CRCD(0xc3d43b9a,"blank")));
10436 
10437  float duration;
10438  if (pParams->GetFloat(NONAME,&duration))
10439  {
10440  Nx::CLoadScreen::sStartLoadingBar(duration);
10441  }
10442 
10443  return true;
10444 }
10445

10447 /* */
10448 /* */
10449 /******************************************************************/

10452 bool ScriptHideLoadingScreen( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
10453 {
10454  //LoadScreen::Hide();
10455  Nx::CLoadScreen::sHide();
10456 
10457  return true;
10458 }

10542 /* */
10543 /* */
10544 /******************************************************************/
10545 
10546 bool ScriptStartLobbyList( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
10547 {
10548  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10549 
10550  if( gamenet_man->GetServerListState() == GameNet::vSERVER_LIST_STATE_SHUTDOWN )
10551  {
10552  gamenet_man->SetNextServerListState( GameNet::vSERVER_LIST_STATE_STARTING_LOBBY_LIST );
10553  gamenet_man->SetServerListState( GameNet::vSERVER_LIST_STATE_INITIALIZE );
10554  }
10555  else
10556  {
10557  gamenet_man->SetServerListState( GameNet::vSERVER_LIST_STATE_STARTING_LOBBY_LIST );
10558  }
10559 
10560  return true;
10561 }

10665 
10666 bool ScriptGetFireballLevel(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10667 {
10668  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10669  int level;
10670 
10671  Script::CStruct* params = pScript->GetParams();
10672 
10673  level = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetFireballLevel();
10674  params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x651533ec,"level"), level );
10675 
10676  return true;
10677 }
10678 
10679 /******************************************************************/
10680 /* */
10681 /* */
10682 /******************************************************************/
10683 
10684 // @script | GameModeEquals | returns true if the current game mode matches
10685 // the specified game mode
10686 // @uparm name | game mode to check. More than one may be specified, eg GameModeEquals is_singlesession is_creategoals
10687 bool ScriptGameModeEquals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10688 {
10689  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10690 
10691  CComponent *pComp=pParams->GetNextComponent();
10692  while (pComp)
10693  {
10694  if (pComp->mNameChecksum==0 && pComp->mType==ESYMBOLTYPE_NAME)
10695  {
10696  if (skate_mod->GetGameMode()->IsTrue(pComp->mChecksum))
10697  {
10698  return true;
10699  }
10700  }
10701  pComp=pParams->GetNextComponent(pComp);
10702  }
10703  return false;
10704 }
10705 
10706 /******************************************************************/
10707 /* */
10708 /* */
10709 /******************************************************************/
10710

10712 bool ScriptOnServer(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10713 {

10715  return gamenet_man->OnServer();
10716 }

10718 /******************************************************************/
10719 /* */
10720 /* */
10721 /******************************************************************/
10722 
10723 // @script | GetCurrentLevel | returns level=load_foun (or whatever)
10724 // so you can use it with LoadLevel, without going through LoadRequestedLevel
10725 bool ScriptGetCurrentLevel(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10726 {
10727  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10728  pScript->GetParams()->AddComponent( Script::GenerateCRC("level"), ESYMBOLTYPE_NAME, (int)skate_mod->m_requested_level );
10729 
10730  Game::CGoalManager* p_goal_manager = Game::GetGoalManager();
10731  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_goal_manager,("NULL p_goal_manager ?"));
10732  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum(CRCD(0x16a0b364,"level_structure"),p_goal_manager->GetLevelStructureName());
10733 
10734 
10735  return true;
10736 }
10737

10739 /* */

10805 /******************************************************************/
10806 /* */
10807 /* */
10808 /******************************************************************/
10809 
10810 // @script | IsTrue | Checks to see whether some global constant equals
10811 // 1 or 0. (If it's not defined anywhere, then it returns 0.) <nl>
10812 // Usage: <nl>
10813 // if IsTrue run_viewer <nl>
10814 // printf "I am in viewer mode" <nl>
10815 // else <nl>
10816 // printf "I am in skateshop mode" <nl>
10817 // endif <nl>
10818 // if IsTrue test_balls <nl>
10819 // where test_balls is defined in "yourname".q. <nl>
10820 // printf "I am testing my balls here" <nl>
10821 // endif
10822 // @uparm name | global constant to check
10823 bool ScriptIsTrue(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10824 {
10825  int Integer=0;
10826  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &Integer, false );
10827 
10828  return Integer;
10829 }
10830 
10831 /******************************************************************/
10832 /* */
10833 /* */
10834 /******************************************************************/
10835 
10836 // @script | GameFlow |
10837 // @uparm name | script name
10838 bool ScriptGameFlow(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10839 {
10840  uint32 ScriptChecksum=0;
10841  pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME,&ScriptChecksum);
10842  Dbg_MsgAssert(ScriptChecksum,("\n%s\nGameFlow requires a script name, eg Gameflow Blaa",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
10843 
10844  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10845  Dbg_AssertPtr( skate_mod->mp_gameFlow );
10846  skate_mod->mp_gameFlow->Reset( ScriptChecksum );
10847  return true;
10848 }
10849 
10850 /******************************************************************/
10851 /* */
10852 /* */
10853 /******************************************************************/
10854 
10855 bool ScriptLastBroadcastedCheatWas(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10856 {
10857  uint32 cheat_flag;
10858 
10859  pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0xae94c183,"cheat_flag"), &cheat_flag, true );
10860 
10861  return( s_last_broadcast_cheat == cheat_flag );
10862 }
10863 
10864 /******************************************************************/
10865 /* */
10866 /* */
10867 /******************************************************************/
10868 
10869 bool ScriptClearCheats(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10870 {
10871  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
10872  Obj::CSkaterCareer* career;
10873 
10874  career = skate_mod->GetCareer();
10875  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x13d5b5db,"CHEAT_ON_1")));
10876  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x8adce461,"CHEAT_ON_2")));
10877  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xfddbd4f7,"CHEAT_ON_3")));
10878  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x63bf4154,"CHEAT_ON_4")));
10879  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x14b871c2,"CHEAT_ON_5")));
10880  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x8db12078,"CHEAT_ON_6")));
10881  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xfab610ee,"CHEAT_ON_7")));
10882  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x6a090d7f,"CHEAT_ON_8")));
10883  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x1d0e3de9,"CHEAT_ON_9")));
10884  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x37cbee45,"CHEAT_ON_10")));
10885  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x40ccded3,"CHEAT_ON_11")));
10886  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xd9c58f69,"CHEAT_ON_12")));
10887  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xaec2bfff,"CHEAT_ON_13")));
10888  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x30a62a5c,"CHEAT_ON_14")));
10889  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x47a11aca,"CHEAT_ON_15")));
10890  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xdea84b70,"CHEAT_ON_16")));
10891  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xa9af7be6,"CHEAT_ON_17")));
10892  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x39106677,"CHEAT_ON_18")));
10893  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x4e1756e1,"CHEAT_ON_19")));
10894  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x1ce6bd86,"CHEAT_ON_20")));
10895  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x6be18d10,"CHEAT_ON_21")));
10896  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0xf2e8dcaa,"CHEAT_ON_22")));
10897  career->UnSetGlobalFlag( Script::GetInteger(CRCD(0x85efec3c,"CHEAT_ON_23")));
10898 
10899  return true;
10900 }
10901 
10902 /******************************************************************/
10903 /* */
10904 /* */
10905 /******************************************************************/
10906 
10907 bool ScriptBroadcastCheat(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10908 {
10909  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10910  Lst::Search< Net::Conn > sh;
10911  Net::Conn* conn;
10912  Net::Server* server;
10913  uint32 cheat_flag;
10914  char on;
10915 
10916  pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0xae94c183,"cheat_flag"), &cheat_flag, true );
10917  Dbg_Assert( gamenet_man->OnServer());
10918  Dbg_Assert( gamenet_man->InNetGame());
10919  if( pParams->ContainsComponentNamed(CRCD(0xf649d637,"on")))
10920  {
10921  on = 1;
10922  }
10923  else
10924  {
10925  on = 0;
10926  }
10927 
10928  // Intentionally sprinkled in this function so that hackers have a more-difficult time to
10929  // nullify it
10930  s_last_broadcast_cheat = cheat_flag;
10931  server = gamenet_man->GetServer();
10932  for( conn = server->FirstConnection( &sh ); conn; conn = server->NextConnection( &sh ))
10933  {
10934  if( conn->IsRemote())
10935  {
10936  Net::MsgDesc msg_desc;
10937  GameNet::MsgToggleCheat msg;
10938 
10939  msg.m_Cheat = cheat_flag;
10940  msg.m_On = on;
10941 
10942  msg_desc.m_Id = GameNet::MSG_ID_TOGGLE_CHEAT;
10943  msg_desc.m_Queue = Net::QUEUE_SEQUENCED;
10944  msg_desc.m_Data = &msg;
10945  msg_desc.m_Length = sizeof( GameNet::MsgToggleCheat );
10946  msg_desc.m_GroupId = GameNet::vSEQ_GROUP_PLAYER_MSGS;
10947 
10948  server->EnqueueMessage( conn->GetHandle(), &msg_desc );
10949  s_last_broadcast_cheat = cheat_flag;
10950  }
10951  }
10952 
10953  s_last_broadcast_cheat = cheat_flag;
10954  return true;
10955 }
10956 
10957 /******************************************************************/
10958 /* */
10959 /* */
10960 /******************************************************************/
10961 
10962 bool ScriptCheatAllowed(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10963 {
10964  uint32 cheat_flag;
10965 
10966  pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0xae94c183,"cheat_flag"), &cheat_flag, true );
10967 
10968  return true;
10969 }

10976 // @script | JoinWithPassword | joins the server with the specified password
10977 // @parm string | string | password string
10978 bool ScriptJoinWithPassword(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10979 {
10980 
10981  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
10982 
10983  const char* p_string;
10984  pParams->GetText( "string", &p_string, true );
10985 
10986  gamenet_man->ReattemptJoinWithPassword((char*) p_string );
10987 
10988  return true;
10989 }

10991 /******************************************************************/
10992 /* */
10993 /* */
10994 /******************************************************************/
10995 
10996 // @script | SendChatMessage |
10997 // @parm string | string | the message to send
10998 bool ScriptSendChatMessage(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
10999 {
11000 
11001  const char* p_string = NULL;
11002  pParams->GetText( "string", &p_string );
11003  if( p_string == NULL )
11004  {
11005  return false;
11006  }
11007 
11008 #if ( ENGLISH == 0 )
11009  if ( ( p_string != NULL ) && ( strlen( p_string ) > 0 ) && ( stricmp( p_string, Script::GetLocalString( "kc_str_empty" ) ) ) )
11010 #else
11011  if ( ( p_string != NULL ) && ( strlen( p_string ) > 0 ) && ( stricmp( p_string, "--EMPTY--" ) ) )
11012 #endif
11013  {
11014  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
11015  gamenet_man->SendChatMessage( (char*) p_string );
11016  }
11017 
11018  return true;
11019 }
11020 
11021 /******************************************************************/
11022 /* */
11023 /* */
11024 /******************************************************************/
11025 
11026 // @script | InSlapGame | true if we are in a slap or netslap game
11027 bool ScriptInSlapGame( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
11028 {
11029 
11030  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
11031 
11032  if( ( skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetNameChecksum() == Script::GenerateCRC( "netslap" )) ||
11033  (skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetNameChecksum() == Script::GenerateCRC( "slap" )))
11034  {
11035  return true;
11036  }
11037 
11038  return false;
11039 }
11040 
11041 /******************************************************************/
11042 /* */
11043 /* */
11044 /******************************************************************/
11045 
11046 // @script | SetScreenMode | Sets the way the screen will be split up into separate
11047 // viewports in the game. If there is more than one viewport, and multiple skaters
11048 // are active, then each skater will get his own viewport
11049 // @uparm One_Camera | the mode to use - one of the following: <nl>
11050 // One_Camera <nl>
11051 // Split_Vertical <nl>
11052 // Split_Horizontal <nl>
11053 // Split_Quarters
11054 bool ScriptSetScreenMode(Script::CScriptStructure *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
11055 {
11056  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
11057 
11058  Nx::ScriptSetScreenMode( pParams, pScript );
11059 
11060  Obj::CSkater* pSkater;
11061  Mdl::Score* pScore;
11062  for( uint i = 0; i < Mdl::Skate::vMAX_SKATERS; i++ )
11063  {
11064  pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(i);
11065  if ( pSkater ) // Skater might not exist
11066  {
11067  pScore = pSkater->GetScoreObject();
11068  pScore->RepositionMeters();
11069  }
11070  }
11071 
11072  return true;
11073 }
11074 
11075 /******************************************************************/
11076 /* */
11077 /* */
11078 /******************************************************************/
11079 
11080 // @script | SetScreenModeFromGameMode | sets the appropriate screen mode based on the game mode
11081 bool ScriptSetScreenModeFromGameMode( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
11082 {
11083  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
11084  Nx::ScreenMode requested_mode, current_mode;
11085 
11086  Obj::CSkater* pSkater;
11087  Mdl::Score* pScore;
11088  for( uint i = 0; i < Mdl::Skate::vMAX_SKATERS; i++ )
11089  {
11090  pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(i);
11091  if ( pSkater && pSkater->IsLocalClient()) // Skater might not exist
11092  {
11093  printf ("cfuncs %d: SUTUBBBEDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD\n",__LINE__);
11094 
11095  /*
11096  Gfx::Camera *p_camera = pSkater->GetSkaterCam();
11097  if (p_camera)
11098  {
11099  Nx::CViewportManager::sSetCameraAllScreenModes(pSkater->GetHeapIndex(), p_camera);
11100  }
11101  */
11102  }
11103  }
11104 
11105  // set up the appropriate screen mode
11106  requested_mode = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetScreenMode();
11107  current_mode = Nx::CViewportManager::sGetScreenMode();
11108  if(! (( ( requested_mode == Nx::vSPLIT_V ) &&
11109  ( current_mode == Nx::vSPLIT_H )) ||
11110  (( requested_mode == Nx::vSPLIT_H ) &&
11111  ( current_mode == Nx::vSPLIT_V ))))
11112  {
11113  Nx::CViewportManager::sSetScreenMode( requested_mode );
11114  }
11115 
11116  for( uint i = 0; i < Mdl::Skate::vMAX_SKATERS; i++ )
11117  {
11118  pSkater = skate_mod->GetSkater(i);
11119  if ( pSkater && pSkater->IsLocalClient()) // Skater might not exist
11120  {
11121  pScore = pSkater->GetScoreObject();
11122  pScore->RepositionMeters();
11123  }
11124  }
11125 
11126  return true;
11127 }

11169 bool ScriptGetInitialsString( Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript )
11170 {

11172  Records::CGameRecords *pGameRecords=pSkate->GetGameRecords();
11173

11175 
11176  return true;
11177 }

11181 /* */
